snippet: At a time when political leaders never admit fault and rarely accept responsibility, Komen did both, and that's worth celebrating.
abstract: At a time when political leaders never admit fault and rarely accept responsibility, Komen did both, and that's worth celebrating.
lead_paragraph: This morning, the Susan G. Komen for the Cure foundation reversed its decision to cut off funding for breast cancer screenings arranged by Planned Parenthood.

headline.main: The Komen Foundation Apologizes, Reverses on Planned Parenthood

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Komen, Susan G, for the Cure
